edu.nyu.cs.javagit.api.commands
Class GitBranchOptions

java.lang.Object
  edu.nyu.cs.javagit.api.commands.GitBranchOptions

public class GitBranchOptions
extends java.lang.Object

A class to manage passing branch options to the GitBranch command.

isOptVerbose

public boolean isOptVerbose()
Indicates if the verbose option should be used.

Returns:
True if the verbose option should be used, false otherwise.

public void setOptVerbose(boolean optVerbose)
Checks whether the verbose option should be set and sets it.

Parameters:
optVerbose - True if the verbose option should be used, false otherwise.

Returns:

Parameters:
optAbbrev - True if the --abbrev option should be used, false otherwise.

getOptAbbrevLen

public int getOptAbbrevLen()
Indicates if the length other than default length should be used for --abbrev option.

Returns:
An integer value for abbrev length if the --abbrev option should be used.

setOptAbbrevLen

public void setOptAbbrevLen(int optAbbrevLen)
Sets the length to be used for --abbrev option to a value other than default length.

Parameters:
optAbbrevLen - An integer value for abbrev length if the --abbrev option should be used.

getOptContains

public Ref getOptContains()
Indicates if the --contains option should be used. This is the commit value for --contains.

Returns:
Ref Ref if the verbose option should be used, null otherwise.

checkCanSetNoArgOption

public void checkCanSetNoArgOption(java.lang.String option)
Checks whether an option for displaying branches can be set. If not, throws an IllegalArgumentException.

Parameters:
option - The name of the option being checked; for use in exception messages.

checkCanSetCreateOption

public void checkCanSetCreateOption(java.lang.String option)

Parameters:
option - The name of the option being checked; for use in exception messages.
